import React, { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import styles from "./Careers.module.scss"; import "bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css"; import { jobs } from "../../services/services"; import CareersForm from "../../../careersforms/Careersform"; export const Careers = () => { const [isVisible, setIsVisible] = useState(false); const [selectedJob, setSelectedJob] = useState(null); // State to track the selected job useEffect(() => { const timer = setTimeout(() => { setIsVisible(true); // Set visibility after 1 second }, 1000); return () => clearTimeout(timer); // Cleanup timer on unmount }, []); const handleApplyClick = (job) => { setSelectedJob(job); // Set the selected job when "Apply Now" is clicked }; const [currentIndex, setCurrentIndex] = useState(0); const handleNext = () => { setCurrentIndex((prevIndex) => (prevIndex + 1) % jobs.length); }; const handlePrev = () => { setCurrentIndex((prevIndex) => (prevIndex - 1 + jobs.length) % jobs.length); }; return (
Come let's build Something of great Value

CAREERS

{jobs.map((job, index) => (

{job.title}

{job.experience}

{job.availability}

{job.location}

Minimum Qualification

    {job.qualifications.map((qual, index) => (
  • {qual}
    • ))}
))}
{/* Carousel Controls */}
{/* Single Modal for Applying */}

What People are Saying About Us!

{/* Review 1 */}
Priyanshika Reddy

"Great service and support! Highly recommended."

{/* 4-star rating */} {/* */}
Posted on Google
{/* Review 2 */}
Maheshwari Kamal

"Excellent customer care and timely response."

{/* 4-star rating */}
Posted on Google
); }; export default Careers;
